name: SUBTERRA (itch) (danielemarotta)
description:
It's recommended to play the Windows version. WebGL has been reported to be unstable.

STORY

The fires are upon us, we must dig deeper to avoid a total wipeout of the human race.

OBJECTIVE

Dig deeper and deeper and survive as long as you can.

HOW TO PLAY

Bring crystals back to the SUBTERRA using your miners. If the SUBTERRA engines run out of crystals then you are doomed.

  1. WASD to move the camera
  2. Use the ON / OFF buttons to toggle the SUBTERRA engines
  3. Click on the miners to enter Dig Mode and set the path they should follow
  4. Miners will pick up any crystals they dig
  5. Crystals have to be brought back to the SUBTERRA in order to fuel its engines

CREDITS

  • Simeon Radivoev
  • Bashaar Saade
